title: maDam kaTTaDA
sahitya:
maTham kaTTaDA vairAgiyE maDamai iruL pOna dhiDa manattilE


anupallavi

  ciDumUnji selvar koDu piccaiyEn uDai tiruvOTTai uzhaittuNDu jnAna


caraNam    paNakkAAran vITTil rasavAdamEn pATTALi vErvai pashum tangamAm
gunak-kunrin mElE nirguNa samAdhi kUDip-pErinba vIDu sEravE
